instruction: Choose a movie and give 3 reasons why it is worth watching
output: Inception is worth watching for a variety of reasons. Firstly, it has a unique storyline that keeps viewers engaged and leaves them guessing until the very end. Secondly, the stunning visuals and powerful soundtrack help to amplify the emotional intensity of the story. Finally, the film is filled with complex, engaging characters and mind-bending twists that will keep viewers on the edge of their seats.
